__e: He says a year of torture is enough.
I can go through. No, Louis, the worst form of torture is what you'll do if you don't have something to occupy your mind.
Oh, he won't talk, Paris, but with what they're doing to him, if we don't get him in 72 hours, he'll be dead.
What could be worse than torture and murder?
If only I could draw her to the castle, then I'm convinced there would be no more victims.
They were all about torture and death.
